siteConfig.name: Abdul Haseeb
siteConfig.role: MERN Stack Developer & AI Automation Engineer

hero.name: Abdul Haseeb
hero.description: I craft dynamic, responsive, and intelligent web applications using modern technologies and AI-driven automation.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Me
paragraphs: Hi, I'm **Abdul Haseeb** ‚Äî a dedicated MERN Stack Developer & AI Automation Engineer with a strong passion for crafting dynamic, responsive, and intelligent web applications.
My journey started with a curiosity to create interactive websites and has evolved into a passion for *AI-driven development, automation workflows, and voice agent systems.*
Whether it's a sleek UI or a robust backend, I enjoy every step of turning ideas into real, impactful products through clean and efficient code.

history.title: Madrasa-tul-Madina
history.description: Hifz-e-Quran Certification with Tajweed and Islamic Studies

history.title: DAR-UL-MADINAH
history.description: Matriculation in Computer Science with focus on fundamental concepts.

history.title: Saylani Mass IT Training
history.description: Professional certification in MERN Stack Development with hands-on project experience.

skills.title: Technical
skills.subtitle: Skills
skills.description: A comprehensive list of technologies and tools I specialize in to build modern software solutions.

projects.title: Featured
projects.subtitle: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on, ranging from SaaS platforms to AI healthcare assistants.

items.title: Furniro Clone
items.description: Responsive e-commerce site built with React, Firebase, and Tailwind CSS. Features user auth, dynamic routing, and product pages.
items.longDescription: Responsive e-commerce site built with React, Firebase, and Tailwind CSS. Features user authentication, dynamic routing, and product pages. Images are lazy-loaded for performance optimization.

items.title: Shrinkly
items.description: Modern URL shortener with support for custom slugs, link expiration, and user authentication.
items.longDescription: Modern URL shortener with support for custom slugs, link expiration, and user authentication. Built for reliability, security, and a clean user experience using MERN stack.

items.title: EMS (Employee Management System)
items.description: A feature-rich employee management system built with the MERN stack. Includes task assignment and role-based login.
items.longDescription: A feature-rich employee management system built with the MERN stack. Includes task assignment, role-based login (admin/user), performance tracking, and a responsive dashboard interface.

items.title: VScode Inspired Portfolio
items.description: A VS Code-inspired portfolio website built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
items.longDescription: A VS Code-inspired portfolio website built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features a code editor layout, interactive navigation, customizable sections, and a fully responsive design optimized for all devices.

items.title: Beneficiary Management System
items.description: Web app for organizations to manage and track beneficiaries using CNIC-based identification.
items.longDescription: Web app for organizations to manage and track beneficiaries using CNIC-based identification. Role-based access ensures security and streamlined data control for efficient operations.

items.title: Project Tracker
items.description: Full-stack task manager using React, Express, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS.
items.longDescription: Full-stack task manager using React, Express, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS. Create, organize, and filter tasks in real time with a clean UI designed for better team productivity.

items.title: StartupCRM
items.description: A comprehensive Sales Intelligence Platform designed for high-growth startups.
items.longDescription: StartupCRM is a powerful dashboard for sales teams to track leads, manage pipelines, and gain intelligence. It features real-time charts, lead scoring, and automated follow-ups. Built with React and Node.js.

items.title: Helply
items.description: AI-powered customer support platform with integrated live chat and automation.
items.longDescription: Helply leverages AI to automate customer service. It includes a smart chatbot that handles common queries and a dashboard for human agents to take over when needed.

items.title: Hireflow
items.description: Modern recruitment and job board platform connecting top talent with companies.
items.longDescription: Hireflow simplifies the hiring process. Candidates can apply for jobs, while employers can manage applications and schedule interviews through an intuitive interface.

items.title: Meridian Commerce
items.description: Premium e-commerce dashboard with real-time analytics and inventory management.
items.longDescription: A full-featured e-commerce management system. It tracks sales, inventory levels, and customer behavior with beautiful visualizations and reports.

items.title: Finance Assistant
items.description: Secure personal finance manager for tracking expenses and setting budgets.
items.longDescription: Finance Assistant helps users take control of their money. Link accounts, track every penny, and get AI-driven insights on how to save more effectively.

items.title: CareSync
items.description: AI-powered healthcare assistant for patient management and appointment booking.
items.longDescription: CareSync bridges the gap between patients and doctors. It provides symptom checking, appointment scheduling, and secure medical record storage.

items.title: AI Collab Chat
items.description: Real-time team collaboration app with integrated AI assistants and video calling.
items.longDescription: A modern workspace where teams can chat, share files, and hold video calls. AI assistants are available in every channel to help with research and drafting.

items.title: CryptoPulse
items.description: AI-driven crypto portfolio tracker with real-time market data and insights.
items.longDescription: CryptoPulse tracks your crypto assets across different exchanges. It uses AI to provide sentiment analysis and market trend predictions.

reviews.title: Client
reviews.subtitle: Reviews
reviews.description: Hear from people I've collaborated with on various projects.

items.name: James Anderson
items.review: Working with Haseeb was a fantastic experience. He delivered exactly what we needed, on time and with clean code.

items.name: Emily Stone
items.review: Very reliable and professional. Haseeb understood our requirements clearly and exceeded expectations.

items.name: Ahmed Khalid
items.review: Great communication and impressive React skills. He built a secure and fast web app for us. Highly recommended!

contact.title: Let's
contact.subtitle: Connect
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to discuss a collaboration? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to new opportunities.
